reviewText: Another of the best of the modern Terence Hill/ Bud Spencer comedy spoofs. Non-fans may find this too corny compared with the Trinity films, but that is why they are not fans! Starting with one of the best Spencer set-ups Hill has yet arranged, films goes through many hilarious slapstick episodes. Only weakness in my opinion is the villain, K-1. His female karate companion makes up for him, however. Secret agent spoofing themes make film of interest to James Bond fans, also.
